name: Data Connect Corporation
overview:
Data Connect specializes in trade show data management and automation and provides customized document management solutions.

Since 1988, Data Connect has delivered customized, integrated software solutions that solve specific business needs and help companies nationwide protect their content. Data Connect develops solutions that enhance a clientâ€™s ability to manage how information is stored, retrieved, and audited.

In addition to its core competency of document management, Data Connect is the leading provider of automated trade show software solutions within the food distribution industry. In recent years its software platform, Show Expert Systems, has expanded to accommodate events within the hardware and healthcare distribution markets. Show Expert provides the ability to pre-register, pre-book, target items to customers, and negotiate deals prior to an event. At the show, a number of services are offered, including: registration, ordering via touchscreen Point-Of-Sale computers, electronic lead collection, reporting, additional rebate negotiation, prize redemption, and drawings.

To learn more about Data Connect’s document management solutions, visit http://www.dataconnectcorp.com/index.php/products/document_management/

To discover more about its Show Expert trade show software, visit http://www.dataconnectcorp.com/index.php/products/showexpertsystemstradeshow_software/

Data Connect was founded by Tim Hobbs, graduate of the Colorado School of Mines.
